nodes.bodyText: As part of general cleanup and since you touched this code anyway - shouldn't this method be renamed from getHttps to isHttps? Since it's returning trivial boolean value and that's the common convention to use is... for bool methods...

For gc.su connector in similar place I was using connector.getHttps() which IMO more transparent than bare true value and also it's better for maintainability as you won't need to update in everywhere if something changes..

The https parameter from the OAuthParameters data structure is now unused.
This will not covered in this PR.
a bit of off-topic, but www is also obsolete now and can be removed :)
